challenges.title: ffuf
challenges.description: TryHackMe room: (Walkthrough) Enumeration, fuzzing, and directory brute forcing using ffuf.

challenges.title: Red Stone One Carat
challenges.description: TryHackMe room: First room of the Red Stone series. Hack ruby using ruby.

challenges.title: Crack The Hash Level 2
challenges.description: TryHackMe room: Advanced cracking hashes challenges and wordlist generation.

challenges.title: Men in black box
challenges.description: A web challenge that was available during SigSegV1 CTF (2018). It was a Boolean-based Blind SQLi with WAF.

challenges.title: Sensory Domination Droid
challenges.description: A programming challenge that was available during SigSegV1 CTF (2018). It was an IRC bot, the goal was to parse private IRC messages.

challenges.title: Fat
challenges.description: A web challenge that was available during SigSegV2 CTF (2019). It was a Slim SSTI combined with a Sinatra/Rack session cookie forgery.

challenges.title: Image Checker 1
challenges.description: A web challenge that was available during SigSegV2 CTF (2019). It was a XXE OOB via SVG rasterization and a local file read.

challenges.title: Image Checker 2
challenges.description: A web challenge that was available during SigSegV2 CTF (2019). It was a XXE OOB via SVG combined with a SSRF port scan and a SSRF localhost bypass.

challenges.title: 10 questions about my system
challenges.description: A forensics challenge that was available during SigSegV2 CTF (2019). It was a Volatility profile creation and 10 basic questions on the memory dump.

challenges.title: Une porte peut en cacher une autre
challenges.description: A web challenge that was available during SigSegV2 CTF (2019). It was a b374k.php webshell with c99 style PHP backdoor authentication bypass.

challenges.title: noraj secret zone
challenges.description: A web/misc/reverse/network challenge that was available during SigSegV2 CTF (2019). It was an eepsite (I2P website) containing obfuscated JavaScript.

challenges.title: The long way
challenges.description: A misc challenge that was available during SigSegV2 CTF (2019). It was a extra long file path on exFAT FS, scripting was mandatory to retrieve the whole path.

challenges.title: Drugs: crack & hash
challenges.description: A cracking challenge that was available during SigSegV2 CTF (2019). Password hash cracking with custom dictionary/wordlist. There were 10 hashes to crack.

challenges.title: Matz 2.3
challenges.description: A reverse challenge that was available during SigSegV2 CTF (2019). Ruby bytecode reverse engineering/disassembly making use of RubyVM class.
